p: The Genbank accession numbers registered for DNA gyrA sequences of C. jejuni and C. coli in this study are MT947448 and MT947449, respectively. Furthermore, MT947448 and MT947449 exhibited two silent mutations each (AGT to AGC for Ser119Ser and GCC to GCT for Ala120Ala in C. jejuni; TTT to TTC for Phe99Phe and GCG to GCA for Ala122Ala in C. coli). The sequences for gyrA genes showed similarity to known sequences from GenBank ( Figure 2).
